customData: <?xml version="1.0"?>   <viewConfigSet>     <viewConfig type="listOfStudents" name="IL_3-8_ELA" value="3-8">       <displaySet displayName="">         <field type="studentInfo" value="name" format="firstLast" displayName="Student">           <lozenges names="504 limitedEnglishProficiency schoolFoodServiceEligibility IEP LEA RPT" position="post" maxCount="5"/>         </field>       </displaySet>       <displaySet displayName="ISAT Writing (highest)">         <field type="assessment" value="ISAT Writing.Mastery level" timeSlot="HIGHEST_EVER" visual="" displayName="Perf. Lvl."/>         <field type="assessment" value="ISAT Writing.Scale score" timeSlot="HIGHEST_EVER" visual="" displayName="SS"/>       </displaySet>       <displaySet displayName="ISAT Writing (most recent)">         <field type="assessment" value="ISAT Writing.Mastery level" timeSlot="MOST_RECENT_RESULT" visual="" displayName="Perf. Lvl."/>         <field type="assessment" value="ISAT Writing.Scale score" timeSlot="MOST_RECENT_RESULT" visual="" displayName="SS"/>       </displaySet>       <displaySet displayName="Attendance">         <field type="attendance" value="ATTENDANCE.AbsenceCount" visual="fieldCounter" displayName="Absence Count"/>         <field type="attendance" value="ATTENDANCE.AttendanceRate" visual="fieldRate" displayName="Attendance Rate %"/>         <field type="attendance" value="ATTENDANCE.TardyCount" visual="fieldCounter" displayName="Tardy Count"/>         <field type="attendance" value="ATTENDANCE.TardyRate" visual="fieldRate" displayName="Tardy Rate %"/>       </displaySet>     </viewConfig>     <viewConfig name="IL_9-12" type="listOfStudents" value="9-12">       <displaySet displayName="">         <field displayName="Student" format="firstLast" type="studentInfo" value="name">           <lozenges names="504 limitedEnglishProficiency schoolFoodServiceEligibility IEP RPT LEA" position="post" maxCount="5"/>         </field>       </displaySet>       <displaySet displayName="Reading Test Scores (Highest)">        <field displayName="SAT" timeSlot="HIGHEST_EVER" type="assessment" value="SAT.Scale score.SAT Reading"/>         <field displayName="%ile" timeSlot="HIGHEST_EVER" type="assessment" value="SAT.Percentile.SAT Reading"/>       </displaySet>  <displaySet displayName="Writing Test Scores (Highest)">				<field displayName="SAT" timeSlot="HIGHEST_EVER" type="assessment" value="SAT.Scale score.SAT Writing"/>			<field displayName="%ile" timeSlot="HIGHEST_EVER" type="assessment" value="SAT.Percentile.SAT Writing"/>		</displaySet>     <displaySet displayName="AP Eng. Exam Scores (Highest)">         <field displayName="Lang." timeSlot="HIGHEST_EVER" type="assessment" value="AP-Language.Scale score" visual=""/>         <field displayName="Lit." timeSlot="HIGHEST_EVER" type="assessment" value="AP-literature.Scale score" visual=""/>       </displaySet>       <displaySet displayName="Attendance">         <field type="attendance" value="ATTENDANCE.AbsenceCount" visual="fieldCounter" displayName="Absence Count"/>         <field type="attendance" value="ATTENDANCE.AttendanceRate" visual="fieldRate" displayName="Attendance Rate %"/>         <field type="attendance" value="ATTENDANCE.TardyCount" visual="fieldCounter" displayName="Tardy Count"/>         <field type="attendance" value="ATTENDANCE.TardyRate" visual="fieldRate" displayName="Tardy Rate %"/>       </displaySet>     </viewConfig>   </viewConfigSet>
